title: macbook pro 想換ssd 有問題

replies.msg:
MacBook Pro (Retina, 13-inch, Mid 2014)
2.6 GHz Intel Core i5
8 GB 1600 MHz DDR3
Intel Iris 1536 MB

本身部機得121GB儲存 參考youtube
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QOxfuDSmXRg
''Upgrading 2014 Macbook Pro Retina 15" SSD to M.2 NVMe (Samsung SSD 970 EVO)''
想幫部機換 M.2 NVMe (Samsung SSD 970 EVO) 500GB或者 2百GB都夠用
所以想問下你地Samsung SSD 970 EVO係咪最好選擇
